participant_1.name: Dr. Emily Carter
participant_1.personality: Caring and ambitious, she is dedicated to both her family and her medical career.
participant_1.background: my daughter is a child prodigy. i am a doctor. my favorite movie is friday. i enjoy going to the park. i am now looking for a new job.

participant_2.name: Sophia Reynolds
participant_2.personality: Adventurous and lively, she enjoys the thrill of racing and the freedom of the open road.
participant_2.background: i waitress during the day to supplement my income. i've light skin with big brown eyes. its red with blue stripe so it shiny when i race. my main transportation is my motorbike. i wear a motorbike helmet to protect my head.
